name: X-A Worlds I
description:
You awake in some sort of abandoned facility. Find the way out.

Controls:

  • Z: action.
  • X: jump.
  • C: use tool/weapon.

The first game in the series. Developed with X-AF Framework 0.1 (GameMaker: Studio 1.4).

X-A Worlds is a series of small games developed with the X-AF Framework. Each game is intended to show the current development state of the framework (and also serves us as game making learning experience).

When the framework reaches version 1.0, it will be released to the public.
